channel.title: raspberri pi on Calgary RHCE
channel.description: Recent content in raspberri pi on Calgary RHCE

item.title: Retro gaming with RetroPie
item.description: I’ve been using a raspberry pi for some occasional tinkering, but have finally found it a more permanent home. I recently got an itch to play some old console games and thought I’d build a RetroPie. I had all the hardware I needed, but in case you don’t there are kits available that include everything one needs to get a retro gaming system going.
